document_data.name: Dheren Ogresbane
document_data.mainbody: '''Dheren Ogresbane''' was one of the [[Swords of Archendale]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Dheren publicly was an officer in the [[Archendale Army]]. In his [[Red Sword]] role, he appeared on very rare occasion but always pursued the army's agenda. He had started to hire adventurers to spy on the armies of [[Sembia]] and [[Hillsfar]] and to investigate the possibility of traitors inside the dale.
document_data.Personality: Dheren was always very serious in his duties, being very diligent, careful, and observant. His main goal was to train his army in order to be ready for any situation.
